item.title: bang.el
item.description: What is !Bang? DuckDuckGo To learn more, try calling (bang "bang" "") With which websites can I use it? How does it work? It makes the call to DuckDuckGo Use cases GitHub !gh Clojure !clj MemoryAlpha !ma Pubmed, !pm arXiv, !arx bang and Org-roam bang The code (require 'org-roam) (defun bang (prefix term) "Using !
